post.content:
SUPERIOR RATING AT STATES! And an AMAZING performance by our Bandos! CONGRATS and THANK YOU TO OUR BANDOS FOR A FANTASTIC MARCHING SEASON!!!!

Keep the memories of this marching year alive and purchase both the CD (music of the ENTIRE marching season) and the DVD (the ONLY DVD available of our State’s performance). ORDERS ARE DUE BY NOVEMBER 3RD. Order form is attached and is on the Band Booster Website!

LINKS you need to know:

  • Mr. Vitale’s Website
  • Band Booster’s Website
  • FaceBook North Royalton Band Boosters -- Like Us!!
  • Other Fundraisers: GFS and Smile.Amazon.com (see below)

DATES you need to know:

  • Nov 2 – Marching Band Concert GYM 1 7:00pm
  • Nov 2 – Marching season is officially over L
  • Nov 3-8 – GET YOUR UNIFORM CLEANED AT ON THE SPOT DRYCLEANERS
  • Nov 5 – Holiday Ticket Order form available online
  • Nov 9-10 – Marching Band Uniform turn in – details to follow
  • Nov 15-16 – Concert Uniform Pick Up – details to follow
  • NOV 28 – BAND BOOSTER MEETING – MEDIA CENTER @ 7PM

Volunteers Needed For Marching Band Concert

More volunteers are needed for the North Royalton HS Marching Band Concert on Wednesday, November 2, 2016. After the concert the band members and their families will enjoy bakery and beverages. We need a few volunteers to help make sure this event goes smoothly. Please view the Signup Genius link and if you could help out it would be greatly appreciated.

Order Your CD/DVD of Our Marching Band Now!

Download the order form to order your personal copy of the Marching Band Concert (CD) and the State Performance of The Elements (DVD).

The Band Boosters will be offering the ONLY DVD that will be available of our marching band at States. You cannot order a DVD at States like we did in previous years because of all the changes in the copyright laws.

Order both the CD and DVD at a reduced price! Order by NOV 3rd to secure your copies! Call Amanda Kost 440-864-6543 with questions.

Open Chair Positions for 2017-2018

We are starting to plan for the next marching season and we have chair positions that will be open! Please see the list below and consider taking a chair position. It is a rewarding experience, directly impacts the band and the current chairperson will be available to transition the role to you!

  • Hospitality: Helen Kelly – 440-746-9048
  • Fruit Sale: Susie Perez – 440-877-1299

Easter Seals

Mark your calendar and start collecting your clothing and cloth items for our Easter Seals drive: December 18th and 19th. Details to follow!

Other Fundraisers

GFS: If you shop at GFS, remember to mention: North Royalton Band Boosters and Marching Band at checkout. We have an account there and accumulate $$$$ for everything YOU spend!

Smile.Amazon Are you an Amazon shopper? Set up a SMILE.AMAZON account and a percentage of what you purchase will be added to the North Royalton Band Booster account:

YOU can help North Royalton High School Band Boosters when you shop for back-to-school supplies and many other items that you purchase from Amazon! This link will help you set up your SMILE account!.

Support us when you shop for back-to-school items. #StartWithaSmile at http://smile.amazon.com/ch/34-1817202 and Amazon donates.
